channel.title: supernovae: individual: SN 2019cad on Chris Frohmaier
channel.description: Recent content in supernovae: individual: SN 2019cad on Chris Frohmaier

item.title: The double-peaked Type Ic supernova 2019cad: another SN 2005bf-like object
item.description: We present the photometric and spectroscopic evolution of supernova (SN) 2019cad during the first raisebox-0.5extextasciitilde100 d from explosion. Based on the light-curve morphology, we find that SN 2019cad resembles the double-peaked Type Ib/c SN 2005bf and the Type Ic PTF11mnb. Unlike those two objects, SN 2019cad also shows the initial peak in the redder bands. Inspection of the g-band light curve indicates the initial peak is reached in raisebox-0.5extextasciitilde8 d, while the r-band peak occurred raisebox-0.
